select a.seq as code_seq ,a.name as codeName ,b.seq ,b.memberName ,b.memberId ,b.memberPwd ,b.memberEmail ,b.genderCd ,b.birthDay ,b.phoneNumber ,b.delNy ,b.regDatetime ,b.modDatetime from code a
left join member b
on a.seq=b.genderCd
WHERE 1=1
AND a.delNy = #{shDelNy}
AND a.seq = #{shValue} AND a.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
ORDER BY b.seq ASC
select seq ,memberName ,memberId ,memberPwd ,memberEmail ,genderCd ,birthDay ,phoneNumber ,delNy ,regDatetime ,modDatetime from member where 1 = 1 AND seq = #{seq}
mapper.update: update member set delNy = 1 where 1=1 and seq = #{seq}
